text: @RepAdamSchiff ✍️😘#TheLORDReigneth🙌 #Exactly "70 percent of inmates have COVID-19." So, why has Paul Manafort been released? Seemly a "Conflict of Interest", though would it still be if say Bill Cosby, R. Kelly and other prisoners were released because of having Coronavirus concerns?😘#HOLY🙌
